spells.name: Ant Haul
spells.description: Triples carrying capacity of a creature.

spells.name: Aspect of the Falcon
spells.description: Gives bonuses on Perception and ranged attacks.

spells.name: Call Animal
spells.description: Makes an animal come to you.

spells.name: Cloak of Shade
spells.description: Reduces effects of intense sun exposure and environmental heat.

spells.name: Dancing Lantern
spells.description: Animates a lantern that follows you.

spells.name: Feather Step
spells.description: Subject ignores adverse movement effects in difficult terrain.

spells.name: Glide
spells.description: No fall damage, move 60 ft./round while falling.

spells.name: Gravity Bow
spells.description: Arrows do damage as though one size category bigger.

spells.name: Hunter's Howl
spells.description: Treat enemies as favored for 1 round/level.

spells.name: Lead Blades
spells.description: Melee weapons damage as if one size bigger.

spells.name: Negate Aroma
spells.description: Subject cannot be tracked by scent.
